\bibitem{E1} {Expression for $V(M)$ obtained  in \cite{Emparan:2003gg}
    was presented there for $r_c = 1$. However, for the subsequent
    analysis we must keep $r_c$ as a free parameter. Restoring $r_c$
    in this expression, Eq. (\ref{psipot}), leads to  modification of
    some of the results obtained in the previous version of our
    paper. We are grateful to Emparan and Garriga for pointing this
    out.}
